page.title: 14A Culcheth 11 year old
page.content: My name is Julie Porthouse. I am 11 years old. I live with my Mum and Dad and two sisters Diane and Angela. I live in Warrington road. I live in a big old house. I have a pet dog called Shelley. My dad is a doubleglazer and a joiner. My mum is a lollypop lady and a cleaner in the Raven Pub across the road. Sometimes I go shopping to Leigh with Yvonne and my sister Diane and Yvonne's sister Sharon. My best friend is Sarah Dyer. My other friends are Yvonne, Grace and Jane. My hobbies are art, collecting post cards, sewing and roller skating. When I grow up I want to work in a office or be a fashion designer. On Wedesday I go Girl Guilds. When I get in from school I go and call for Sarah. I go to Glazebury C.E Primary School. I like to play tennis and work in my garden.
